channel.title: Pls help with 508 server
channel.description:
hey,
how do u host a rs private server on a vps or dedi??? pls help!
i have a unlimited bandwith and hard drive dedi 1.7 ghz with 1 g ram... and i wanted to host a 508 on it, how do i do that, is there a tutorial? i spent an hour searching but all i have found so far is tuts 2 make ur pc into a server using no-ip.

item.title: Pls help with 508 server
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

You can read more info at: http://www.vpsland.com
